Text: Mr. Lotti is a professor at the institute who every day must strive to educate their students worried. Meanwhile, his wife is persistently courted by a stranger. When the teacher Lotti is seduced by one of her students and accepts the job of administering the hotel's director of the institute (a man with a strong passion to voyeurism) Mrs. Lotti feels so alone ending falling in the arms of his insistent Fans
